price: Lalle ne Ibrãhĩm* ya kasance shũgaba, mai ƙasƙantar da kai ga Allah, mai karkatã zuwa ga gaskiya, kuma bai kasance daga mãsu shirki ba.
arabic: إِنَّ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ كَانَ أُمَّةٗ قَانِتٗا لِّلَّهِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَمۡ يَكُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
footnotes: * Akwai daga ni'imõmin Allah,Ya sanya mutum maɗaukaki sabõda addininsa da ĩmãninsa ga Ubangijinsa, kuma Yã bã shi ĩkon binsa da taƙawa kamar yadda Ya yi wa Ibrahĩm. Kuma akwai daga ni'imõmin Allah Ya sanya mutum a cikin zuriyyar mutumin kirki kamar yadda Ya yi wa Annabi Muhammadu Ya sanya shi a cikin zuriyyar Ibrãhĩm.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna ib'rāhīma kāna ummatan qānitan lillahi ḥanīfan walam yaku mina al-mush'rikīna
